author: senh
title: On Europe’s Goth Trail, From the Brontës to Byron
text: BING NEWS: On Europe’s Goth Trail, From the Brontës to Byron Dracula not enough for you? Need more literary scares? Here are some other spots to follow in the footsteps of other Gothic writers. In Somerset, on England’s southwestern coast, Samuel Taylor Coleridge composed several notable poems, including “The ...
